001package com.technototes.library.subsystem.servo;
002
003import com.technototes.library.hardware.servo.Servo;
004import com.technototes.library.hardware.servo.ServoGroup;
005import com.technototes.library.subsystem.DeviceSubsystem;
006
007/** Class for servo subsystems
008 * @author Alex Stedman
009 */
010public class ServoSubsystem extends DeviceSubsystem<Servo> {
011
012    /** Create servo subsystem
013     *
014     * @param servo The servo
015     */
016    public ServoSubsystem(Servo servo) {
017        super(servo);
018    }
019
020    public ServoSubsystem(Servo... servo) {
021        super(new ServoGroup(servo));
022    }
023
024    /** Set servo subsystem position
025     *
026     * @param position The position
027     */
028    public void setPosition(double position) {
029        getDevice().setPosition(position);
030    }
031
032    /** Get subsystem servo position
033     *
034     * @return The position
035     */
036    public double getPosition() {
037        return getDevice().getPosition();
038    }
039}
